timeline.event: Dillon graduates Harvard with B.S. Mechanical Engineering
Dillon joins Firmament Group as Investor
Claims to research quantum computing at Firmament, cold-contacting 120+ founders
timeline.note: Claimed 'since 2019' positioning based only on dataroom source

timeline.event: Connects with Cambridge Quantum Computing CEO Ilyas Khan
Firmament invests ~$660K in CQC convertible note (~$170K personal + family)
timeline.note: Genuinely early (pre-pandemic quantum); investment terms unverified

timeline.event: Firmament invests in Profit Tools, launches Envase Technologies
Dillon leaves Firmament Group
timeline.note: Both claimed Firmament exits occurred 14-22 months AFTER departure

timeline.event: CQC note converts to equity at $244M entry valuation
Dillon joins Vista Equity Partners
Launches Substack 'Prescience' - tagline 'Precursor to Hyperion'
timeline.note: First verifiable thought leadership is 2021, not 2019

timeline.event: CQC merges with Honeywell quantum unit to form Quantinuum
Logistyx sold to E2open for $185M (>3x MOIC claimed)
timeline.note: Exit 14 months after Dillon left Firmament; attribution ambiguous

timeline.event: Publishes fusion deep-dive on Substack
timeline.note: Need fusion investment dates to assess if thesis was predictive

timeline.event: Invests $45K in Bleximo bridge round
ChatGPT released (GPT-3.5), sparking AI robotics hype
Envase sold to WiseTech Global for $230M (>5x MOIC claimed)
timeline.note: Exit 22 months after Dillon left Firmament; attribution ambiguous

timeline.event: Invests $15K in Entheos seed round
Sources Figure AI via Tamarack Global relationship
Invests $40K in Figure AI Series A at $420M post-money
timeline.note: 5 months after ChatGPT = borderline 'early'; not prescient but not late

timeline.event: Figure AI Series A publicly announced
Meets Normal Computing CEO at NYC networking event
Invests in Hephaestus Pre-Seed round
Bleximo CEO commits suicide; company fails
Introduced to Dirac CEO by VC who passed on deal
Invests $20K in Dirac Pre-Seed SAFE at $15M cap; introduces to Founders Fund
Quantinuum raises $300M at $5.3B; Figure AI raises $675M Series B at $2.6B
Entheos folds after hardware partner delays
Normal Computing raises $17M Series A led by Drive Capital
Dirac raises $6M Seed co-led by Founders Fund and Coatue
Receives ~$80K equity award from Normal as advisor
Figure AI completes $1.1B Series C at $39.5B valuation
Quantinuum raises $600M at $10.6B post-money ($10B pre + $600M)
Hyperion raises ~$1.1M SPV for Valar Atomics Series A at $258M
Henry Bellew graduates Harvard with A.B. cum laude
Henry Bellew works as advisor at The Raine Group
timeline.note: Not found on Raine Group team page; role description is vague

timeline.event: Henry Bellew claims 'Henley Royal Regatta Semi-Finalist'
timeline.note: Harvard reached Henley semi-finals in 2024, but Henry graduated in 2023

findings.title: Quantinuum timing genuinely early
findings.description: March 2020 investment predates quantum computing mainstream interest by >90 days.
findings.implication: Prescient call; validates MARKET_TIMING claim for quantum.

findings.title: Core credentials confirmed
findings.description: Harvard engineering degree, Vista and Firmament employment independently verified.
findings.implication: Educational and professional background is legitimate.

findings.title: Firmament exits independently confirmed
findings.description: Envase ($230M) and Logistyx ($185M) exits verified via acquirer announcements.
findings.implication: Exit values are accurate; attribution to Dillon remains ambiguous.

findings.title: Figure AI 'early' claim is borderline
findings.description: Investment (April 2023) was 5 months after ChatGPT. Series A announced 1 month later.
findings.implication: Not prescient but not late. 'Early positioning' claim is partial.

findings.title: No pre-2021 thought leadership
findings.description: Substack launched October 2021. No public evidence of 'positioning since 2019'.
findings.implication: 2-year gap between claimed early positioning and first verifiable thesis.

findings.title: Excluded investments not disclosed
findings.description: Digital assets and 'non-core investments' excluded per GP's subjective view.
findings.implication: Selective portfolio presentation may materially overstate track record.

findings.title: Stale portfolio data
findings.description: Portfolio Summary dated 10.26.25 contains 2024 data. ~1 year gap.
findings.implication: Cannot assess current performance or whether projections materialized.

findings.title: Firmament exit attribution ambiguous
findings.description: Both exits occurred 14-22 months after Dillon's departure (Jan 2021).
findings.implication: Pitch deck language ('helped execute... culminated in') is technically accurate but potentially misleading.

findings.title: Vista attribution unclear
findings.description: '>$1 billion deployed across 15+ deals' cannot be individually attributed.
findings.implication: Individual contribution at $100B+ AUM firm not disclosed.

findings.title: Co-GP underrepresented
findings.description: Henry Bellew appears on 1 of 30 pitch deck pages. No case studies feature his involvement.
findings.implication: Questions whether this is true two-GP partnership or junior role.

findings.title: Henry's Henley claim timing inconsistent
findings.description: Harvard reached Henley semi-finals in 2024, but Henry graduated 2023.
findings.implication: Athletic achievement claim doesn't align with timeline.

verification_priorities: Request independent verification of Quantinuum and Figure AI investment dates/amounts
Obtain disclosure of excluded 'digital assets' and 'non-core investments' with performance
Clarify Dillon's specific role in Firmament's Envase and Logistyx investments
Obtain updated portfolio data (2025) to replace stale 2024 snapshot
Find fusion investment dates to compare against April 2022 blog post
Request Vista reference to verify specific role in $1B+ deployments
Clarify Henry Bellew's Henley timing and Raine Group role
